job_description:
Looking to be a part of a highly innovative organization in your next opportunity!? Our client is currently looking for a Full Stack Java Developer to join the hybrid team in Toronto or Ottawa! If you are looking for a new challenge, and have a great interest in technology, we want to hear from you!

What are the perks:
Pension plan!
Great benefit package!
Great work-life balance!

The Full Stack Java Developer will be responsible for:
Collaborating with technical teams to develop information systems. This involves tasks such as requirements analysis, design, coding, testing, quality assurance, implementation, documentation, and day-to-day maintenance.
Working closely with business partners to understand their needs, develop business process knowledge, and ensure their satisfaction through system development, enhancements, and integrations.
Performing operational tasks, including incident troubleshooting and correction, as well as scheduled product releases. Additionally, working on optimizing and automating these tasks to reduce operational effort.
Analyzing software deficiencies and change requests and implementing changes within production systems.
Developing, modifying, and executing test plans, with an emphasis on automation to enhance testing coverage and reduce effort.
Ensuring proper testing and sign-off procedures as part of the organization's quality assurance review.
Facilitating the promotion and implementation of applications in alignment with departmental change management processes.
Contributing to the planning, development, and delivery of end user training.

The required qualifications for the Full Stack Java Developer are:
3-5 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer with experience in a web-based environment.
Proficiency in Java, Spring, JUnit, MyBatis, SOAP Web Services, PL/SQL, REST, XML, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Maven, RDBMS (Oracle), JBoss, Linux/Windows, Git, Jasper reports, and Tomcat.
Additional assets: Experience with Python, Python libraries, PySpark, AWS API Gateway, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, AWS Aurora, AWS Lambda.
Familiarity with the AWS cloud environment and related tools.
Knowledge of automated testing and DevOps practices.

Summary:
If you are looking for a new challenge, professional growth and have a great interest in technology, please reach out to us today! We can't wait to introduce you to your awesome new team.
